name: VR: RPWA 2050
description:
How long can you survive?

You are tasked with protecting the survivor from the oncoming hordes of zombies. You are his Robotic Personal War Assistant, and it is your duty to keep him alive.

Play with controls so simple that all you need is your Google Cardboard, no controller required! Without a controller you are still able to move, look around, shoot, and in a future update you will be able to switch your weapons all by the movement of your head.

So what are you waiting for? The survivor needs you!

HOW TO PLAY

Windows/Mac:

  • Use mouse to look around/shoot/move
  • Press the escape key to unlock your mouse
  • Click on the game to enable your mouse again

Android

  • In VR mode, use your head to look around/shoot/move
  • In regular mode, drag your finger across the screen to look around/shoot/move
FUTURE PLANS
  • New zombie types
  • New weapons
  • Upgrade items
  • Upgrade survivor
  • Upgrade sniper
  • Upgrade robot
WORDS OF THE PLAYERS This is something I was searching as long as I've heard about Virtual reality and that's the end of my searching. All the things are just lived in this game and I'm having very serious mission to save my master.
